PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-00572011-02-03HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectIce Hockey Helmet Regulations
PrecisICE HOCKEY HELMETS REGULATIONS - will be made from Item 19 of Part I of Schedule I to the Hazardous Products Act in order to continue to reference the Canadian Standards Association standard and to address gaps that otherwise would have been created by the coming into force of the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act on June 20, 2011.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0021 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
